text: The Certificat de formation à la sécurité (CFS) (in English Safety training certificate) is the French national degree required to be flight attendant in France. It replaces the Certificat de Sécurité Sauvetage (CSS) Arrêté du 25 septembre 2007 relatif au certificat de formation à la sécurité since the 16th of July 2008.CERTIFICAT DE FORMATION A LA SECURITE It consists of a theoretical and a practical part,CFS présentation each of them contains teaching in aviation safety and first aid. == References == Category:Aviation in France Category:Education in France Category:Aviation licenses and certifications Category:Academic degrees
title: Certificat de formation à la sécurité
